results.title: Randomized controlled trial of ACE-inhibitors and beta-blockers with and without vasodilating activity in chronic glomerulonephritis.
results.text_hl: A prospective double-blind, randomized study was conducted to compare the effects of the @GENE_MS4A1 @GENE_931 @@@beta 1@@@ antagonist, @GENE_IGKV5_2 @GENE_28907 @@@beta 2@@@ agonist @CHEMICAL_Celiprolol @CHEMICAL_MESH:D017272 @@@celiprolol@@@ (200 mg daily) on renal hemodynamics and protein excretion with those of the @GENE_MS4A1 @GENE_931 @@@beta 1@@@ antagonist @<m>CHEMICAL_Atenolol</m> @CHEMICAL_MESH:D001262 @@@atenolol@@@ (50 mg daily), the @GENE_AP2B1 @GENE_163 @@@ACE-@@@inhibitor @CHEMICAL_Ramipril @CHEMICAL_MESH:D017257 @@@ramipril@@@ (2.5 mg daily), and placebo in 11 @SPECIES_9606 @@@patients@@@ with @DISEASE_Proteinuria @DISEASE_MESH:D011507 @@@proteinuria@@@ > 400 mg/24 h due to @<m>DISEASE_Glomerulonephritis</m> @DISEASE_MESH:D005921 @@@chronic glomerulonephritis@@@.

citations.NLM: Erley CM, Klass M, Krämer D, Berger E, Heyne N, Braun N, Wolf S, Risler T. Randomized controlled trial of ACE-inhibitors and beta-blockers with and without vasodilating activity in chronic glomerulonephritis. Int J Clin Pharmacol Ther. 1996 Nov;34(11):504-9. PMID: 8937934
